code: import moment from'moment';import'moment/locale/fr';moment.locale('fr');var getHourlyForecast=function getHourlyForecast(hourlyForecast){return hourlyForecast.map(function(hourly){return{date:moment(hourly.dt*1000).format('HH:SS'),temperature:Math.round(hourly.temp),descriptions:hourly.weather[0].description,icon:hourly.weather[0].icon};});};export default getHourlyForecast;
